name: Shitou
desc: The owner of Jade Mystery. He is often seen promoting the activity "Betting on Jade."

customize.name: Iron Chunk
customize.desc: This iron chunk can be turned into a multitude of handy items in the hands of a skilled craftsman.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: White Iron Chunk
customize.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Noctilucous Jade
customize.desc: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text: Adventure Challenge: The Stone Tells Ancient Tales

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Dear customer, I really must tell you about the time when our humble store received a famous stone that would shake Liyue to its core. Now, where should I start concerning that stone? Ah, yes. It all started when a hero discovered several suspicious hilichurls...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Hydro</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: A battle in the rain will cause both sides to trigger Elemental Reactions more easily!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Let's see how your luck is looking today, shall we, dear customer?"
Shitou opens his Casket of Tomes to reveal a deck that comprises "Stonehide Lawachurl," "Noelle," and "Xingqiu."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Hydro.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Stonehide Lawachurl
customize.desc:
"Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

value.name: Enhancement Ore
value.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 400 EXP.
A refined ingot with endless possibilities that can be used to enhance weapons.
